name: Trinity Stockpile
text: At any time, you may exhaust this card and purge 1 command token from your strategy pool; destroy all units on a planet that contains a superweapon or is adjacent to your home system. Then, exhaust that planet, if able.

name: Prescient Warriors
text: If you have the Infantry II technology, flip this card and place it on top of Infantry II.

name: Hidden Vaults
text: When you explore a planet, you may produce 1 infantry on that planet. At any time, you may exhaust this card to destroy any number of your units on the game board.

name: Duranium Outfitting
text: At the start of ground combat, choose 1 of your plastic-piece infantry participating in that combat; that plastic-piece unit gains SUSTAIN DAMAGE until the end of that combat.

name: Panoply Animus
text: Your structures gain SUSTAIN DAMAGE and participate in ground combat as if they were ground forces with a combat value of 7

name: Dyrun's War-Bell
text:
If you have more Dishonor than Honor, flip this card. During each round of combat, up to 1 hit you cancel is instead produced against your opponent’s units. 
If you have more Honor than Dishonor, flip this card. Once per round of combat, you may produce 1 hit against your units to produce 1 hit against your opponent’s units.
